text:
QUESTION 170) The graph presents the unemployment rate (in %) for the period from March 2008 to April 2009, obtained based on the data observed in the metropolitan regions of Recife, Salvador, Belo Horizonte, Rio de Janeiro, Sao Paulo and Porto Alegre.
Unemployment rate (%) 8.6 8.5 8.1 7.7 7.6 7.9 7.9 7.6 7.5 6.8 8.2 8.5 8.9 9.0 03/ 08 04 05 06 07 08 09 10 11 12 01/09 02 03 04 The median of this unemployment rate, from March 2008 to April 2009, was
A) 8.1%
B) 8.0%
C) 7.9%
D) 7.7%
E) 7.6%
